settings.desc: Experience epic naval action in World of Warships Legends on your Xbox or PlayStation, a global multiplayer free-to-play online game in which you can master the seas on the decks of history's greatest warships! Recruit Legendary Commanders, upgrade your vessels, and stake your claim to naval domination alongside and against players from around the world.

settings.title: Console Rewards for World of Warships Legends
settings.description_col_1:
Reward for New Players:
  • Tier II US Premium cruiser Charleston
  • 5x Days of Premium
  • 5x Promotional Order
  • 15x Anniversary Camouflage
  • 15x Type 4 Camouflage
  • 20x Rare Ship XP Booster
  • 20x Rare Credit Booster
  • 20x Rare Commander Booster
  • 20x Rare Global XP Booster
  • 20x Rare Battle Booster
  • 37000 Commander XP
settings.description_col_2:
Reward for Existing Players:
  • Japanese Tier II Premium cruiser Katori
  • 30x Type 4 Camouflage
  • 30x Common Battle Booster
  • 30x Rare Battle Booster
  1. New players can activate both codes.

settings.heading_text: Reliable wireless freedom with long-lasting battery life.
settings.desc: Escape the limits of cable connections and sail free with the wireless HyperX Cloud Flight™. With a solid, gaming-grade wireless connection, incredible 30-hour battery life, and signature HyperX comfort, Cloud Flight allows you to play uninterrupted for longer. Available for both PC and Console, you can don your commander's cap no matter what platform you play on!

settings.heading_text: USB microphone with standout style and sound
settings.desc: Featuring an elegant design, a low-profile shock mount, and a tasteful RGB light ring, the HyperX DuoCast is a full-featured USB microphone that’s built for gaming, working, and content creation. Perfect for sailing the seas.

settings.heading: Title with Description

the game: Playstation (https://wo.ws/3Ip1kZW)

your gifts!

settings.title: Explore Additional Supply Options for Your Fleet
settings.subtitle: Whether you’re battling on PC or Console, HyperX gear can help you enhance your World of Warships Legends experience.

settings.description_col_1:
Terms & Conditions of the Promotion*

* Only valid for orders of £75 or more through uk.hyperx.com. You will receive the code(s) on the email address you provided on your order.

The promotion starts on 15/05/2023 at 16.00 GMT and the promotion ends on 15/06/2023 at 16.00 GMT.

One (1) code is awarded, while stock lasts, per qualifying HyperX order during the promotion period. Each code is valid for one-time use.

Code redemption is valid from March 27, 2023 through March 27, 2024.

The in-game items do not have a retail value and cannot be exchanged for cash.

Please note that some of the items become available as players progress in the game. For full EULA, please go here: http://legal.eu.wargaming.net/en/EULA
